_description: On Christ’s faithfulness — one couplet in John Grimestone’s preaching notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
Longingge likingge lestingge an reutheSchewede þat in loue was
                    miche treuthe
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 17.
